item.description:
We do not have much information on this event, but it sounds like it could be interesting:

Often go up Rte 95 and wonder whats behind those two Silos? Well here is our answer, lets go out to Alfalfa Farm and check out their Fall Festival.

The Festival is free unless you participate in the Wine Tasting, other events for the day are:

Tours of the Farm
Live Local Music & Dancing
For the kids: Pumpkin Decorating, Face Painting & Grape Stomping

Wine Tasting ($10pp 21+), and take home a commemorative alfalfa farm wine glass

We have never been to this winery so we are not sure of a good meeting place. If someone has been there and would like to offer some advice, please feel free. In the meantime I will set the meeting spot at the entrance to the store. If you arrive and can't find us please call the meetup phone at 978-304-2811.

Please keep in mind that if the weather is inclement this event may get cancelled. Please check for updates prior to heading out for the event.

Hope to see you at the winery

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: At the entrance to the store
item.name: Fall Festival @ Alfalfa Farm
